verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6113>time,<s%> while he was yet shut up in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>guard,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H3068>it,<s%> Yahweh who <S%H3335>forms<s%> it to <S%H3559>establish<s%> <S%H3068>it;<s%> Yahweh is his <S%H8034>name:<s%>
<S%H7121>Call<s%> to <S%H6030>me,<s%> and I will answer <S%H5046>you,<s%> and will show you <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1219>things,<s%> and <S%H3045>difficult,<s%> which you don't know.

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> concerning the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of this <S%H5892>city,<s%> and concerning the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> which are broken <S%H5422>down<s%> to make a defense against the <S%H5550>mounds<s%> and against the <S%H2719>sword;<s%>

while men <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> and to <S%H4390>fill<s%> them with the dead <S%H6297>bodies<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> whom I have <S%H5221>killed<s%> in my <S%H639>anger<s%> and in my <S%H2534>wrath,<s%> and for all whose <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> I have <S%H5641>hidden<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> from this <S%H5892>city:<s%>

<S%H5927>Behold,<s%> I will bring it <S%H724>health<s%> and <S%H4832>cure,<s%> and I will <S%H7495>cure<s%> <S%H1540>them;<s%> and I will reveal to them <S%H6283>abundance<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> and <S%H571>truth.<s%>

I will cause the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H7725>return,<s%> and will <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H7223>them,<s%> as at the first.

I will <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> them from all their <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> by which they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H5545>me;<s%> and I will pardon all their <S%H5771>iniquities,<s%> by which they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H6586>me,<s%> and by which they have transgressed against me.

This city shall be to me for a <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H8342>joy,<s%> for a <S%H8416>praise<s%> and for a <S%H8597>glory,<s%> before all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> which shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> all the <S%H2896>good<s%> that I <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H6342>them,<s%> and shall fear and <S%H7264>tremble<s%> for all the <S%H2896>good<s%> and for all the <S%H7965>peace<s%> that I procure to <S%H6213>it.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> Yet again there shall be <S%H8085>heard<s%> in this <S%H4725>place,<s%> about which you <S%H559>say,<s%> It is <S%H2720>waste,<s%> without <S%H120>man<s%> and without <S%H929>animal,<s%> even in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> that are <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> without <S%H120>man<s%> and without <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> and without <S%H929>animal,<s%>

the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8342>joy<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8057>gladness,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3618>bride,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of those who <S%H559>say,<s%> Give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H2896>good,<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever;<s%> who <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> For I will cause the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%> as at the <S%H7223>first,<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies:<s%> Yet again shall there be in this <S%H4725>place,<s%> which is <S%H2720>waste,<s%> without <S%H120>man<s%> and without <S%H929>animal,<s%> and in all its <S%H5892>cities,<s%> a <S%H5116>habitation<s%> of <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> causing their <S%H6629>flocks<s%> to lie <S%H7257>down.<s%>

In the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the hill <S%H2022>country,<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H8219>lowland,<s%> and in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H5045>South,<s%> and in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> and in the places <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> shall the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H5674>again<s%> pass under the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of him who <S%H4487>numbers<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H3117>Behold,<s%> the days <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that I will <S%H6965>perform<s%> that <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> which I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> concerning the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and concerning the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

In those <S%H3117>days,<s%> and at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> will I cause a <S%H6780>Branch<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to grow <S%H6779>up<s%> to <S%H1732>David;<s%> and he shall <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

In those <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H3063>Judah<s%> be <S%H3467>saved,<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely;<s%> and this is the name by which she shall be <S%H7121>called:<s%> Yahweh our <S%H3072>righteousness.<s%>

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> shall <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H3772>want<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

neither shall the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H3772>want<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me to <S%H5927>offer<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> and to <S%H6999>burn<s%> meal <S%H4503>offerings,<s%> and to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> <S%H3117>continually.<s%>
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> If you can <S%H6565>break<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3117>day,<s%> and my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3915>night,<s%> so that there shall not be <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> in their <S%H6256>season;<s%>

then may also my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> be <S%H6565>broken<s%> with <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> that he shall not have a <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H4427>reign<s%> on his <S%H3678>throne;<s%> and with the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> my <S%H8334>ministers.<s%>

As the <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> <S%H5608>can't<s%> be numbered, neither the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H4058>measured;<s%> so will I <S%H7235>multiply<s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> who minister to <S%H8334>me.<s%>
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H7200>Don't<s%> consider what this <S%H5971>people<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4940>families<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H977>chose,<s%> he has cast them <S%H3988>off?<s%> thus do they <S%H5006>despise<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> that they should be no more a <S%H1471>nation<s%> before <S%H6440>them.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> If my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H7760>fails,<s%> if I have not appointed the <S%H2708>ordinances<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth;<s%>

<S%H1571>then<s%> will I also cast <S%H3988>away<s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> so that I will not <S%H3947>take<s%> of his <S%H2233>seed<s%> to be <S%H4910>rulers<s%> over the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H3446>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob:<s%> for I will cause their <S%H7622>captivity<s%> to <S%H7725>return,<s%> and will have mercy on <S%H7355>them.<s%>
